data.name: Noara: The Conspiracy - Founder's Pack
data.detailed_description:
For those of you who wants to support us during our Early Access and are brave enough to follow us in the adventure of Noara, we want to say: thank you.
This Founder's Pack rewards you with exclusive content.

This Founder's Pack contains :
  • The exclusive Fire King Akuyandi skin
  • Exclusive skin portrait
  • 3500 Sarme Coins
data.about_the_game:
For those of you who wants to support us during our Early Access and are brave enough to follow us in the adventure of Noara, we want to say: thank you.
This Founder's Pack rewards you with exclusive content.

This Founder's Pack contains :
  • The exclusive Fire King Akuyandi skin
  • Exclusive skin portrait
  • 3500 Sarme Coins
data.short_description: Support the game and the studio to receive exclusive content with the Founder's Pack.
data.supported_languages:
French*, English*, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo ou AMD Athlon™ 64 X2 5600+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 2 Go ou AMD Radeon™ RX 560 2 Go ou Intel® UHD Graphics 630
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 ou AMD FX Series Processor ou supérieur
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1080 8 Go ou AMD Radeon™ RX Vega 64 8 Go ou supérieur
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
